mt.comm.common

Class CommUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • mt.comm.common.CommUtils

  • public final class CommUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an utility class with common methods that are being used within the component networking, either for client and server side.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BLOCKING_QUEUE_CAPACITY
      Blocking queue capacity.
      static java.lang.String CONNECTION_CLOSED_BY_SERVER
      Message used to send to the client informing that an automatic trade behavior was detected.
      static java.lang.String USER_IS_ALREADY_CONNECTED
      Message used to send to the client when a nickname is already in use and connected.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ServerSideMessage createConnectMessage(java.lang.String nickname)
      This method is used to create a server side message of type connected, when the ClientComm is started.
      static ServerSideMessage createDisconnectMessage(java.lang.String nickname)
      This method is used to create a server side message of type disconnected, when the ClientComm is disconnected.
      static ClientSideMessage createErrorMessage(java.lang.String errorMessage)
      This method is used to create an error client side message which is sent to the client.
      static ClientSideMessage createOrderMessage(Order order)
      This method is used to create a client side message for order (sell, buy) which is sent to the client.
      static ServerSideMessage createOrderMessage(java.lang.String nickname, Order order)
      This method is used to create a server side message when a new order (sell, buy) is sent to the server.
      static java.lang.String getCause(java.lang.Exception e)
      This method is used to retrieve a message from an exception or its cause.
      static boolean isEmpty(java.lang.String str)
      This method is used to validate if a certain string is empty.
      static void releaseResources(java.io.Closeable... closables)
      This method is used to release resources such as sockets and streams.

    • Method Detail

      • createConnectMessage

        public static ServerSideMessage createConnectMessage(java.lang.String nickname)
        This method is used to create a server side message of type connected, when the ClientComm is started.
        Parameters:
        nickname - The nickname of the client that starts the ClientComm.
        Returns:
        An object representing a server side message of type connected.

      • createDisconnectMessage

        public static ServerSideMessage createDisconnectMessage(java.lang.String nickname)
        This method is used to create a server side message of type disconnected, when the ClientComm is disconnected.
        Parameters:
        nickname - The nickname of the client that stops the ClientComm.
        Returns:
        An object representing a server side message of type disconnected.

      • createOrderMessage

        public static ServerSideMessage createOrderMessage(java.lang.String nickname,
                                                   Order order)
        This method is used to create a server side message when a new order (sell, buy) is sent to the server.
        Parameters:
        nickname - The nickname of the client that is sending the new order.
        order -
        Returns:
        An object representing a server side message of type new order.

      • createOrderMessage

        public static ClientSideMessage createOrderMessage(Order order)
        This method is used to create a client side message for order (sell, buy) which is sent to the client.
        Parameters:
        order - Order to be sent.
        Returns:
        An object representing a client side message of type order.

      • createErrorMessage

        public static ClientSideMessage createErrorMessage(java.lang.String errorMessage)
        This method is used to create an error client side message which is sent to the client.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - Error message to be sent to the client.
        Returns:
        An object representing an error client side message.
